agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Transportation TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Wednesday, May 8, 2019 PLACE: E2.030 CHAIR: Rep. Terry Canales *Public testimony may be limited to two (2) minutes.* If submitting written documentation, please provide 15 copies (with your name on each) to the committee clerk before or during the hearing. The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the Chair. SB 575 Perry Relating to the designation of a portion of U.S. Highway 84 in Lubbock County as the Trooper Jerry Don Davis Memorial Highway. SB 1593 Rodríguez Relating to training by the Texas Department of Transportation on the recognition and prevention of smuggling and trafficking of persons. SB 2015 Fallon | et al. Relating to the issuance of pediatric cancer research specialty license plates. SB 2168 Watson Relating to relief from local matching funds requirements for certain counties. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
